notes.text:
This update for ovmf fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-0161: Fixed a stack overflow in UsbBusDxe and UsbBusPei, which could 
  potentially be triggered by a local unauthenticated user (bsc#1131361).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Stack overflow in XHCI for EDK II may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.
